authors: Sarah Fitzmaurice For Daily Mail Australia
description: As a model she is used to showing off her flawless figure in photo shoots.
title: Erin McNaught shows off her perfect pins with Example and son Evander
title_page: Erin McNaught shows off her perfect pins with Example and son Evander | Daily Mail Online
text:
As a model she is used to showing off her flawless figure in photo shoots.
But on Sunday Erin McNaught proved that she looks just as good off-duty rocking a pair of tiny denim shorts during a stroll with husband Example.
The 33-year-old and her singer beau decided to make the most of the warm weather by heading to Bronte, Sydney for a seaside walk.
Scroll down for video
Leggy lady: Erin McNaught showed off her perfect pins in a pair of white hotpants as she and husband Example enjoyed a stroll with their son Evander in Bronte, Sydney
Erin used the opportunity to show off her perfect pins in the white ripped hot pants, which she teamed with a grey vest for a casual look.
She wore a pair of white Nike trainers on her feet and a pair of oversized metallic sunglasses to shield her eyes from the sunshine.
Example, real name Elliot John Gleave, wore an all black outfit accessorising with a chunky silver chain around his neck.
Family day out: The 33-year-old model and her singer husband made the most of the warm weather on the walk
Hot metal! Erin wore a pair of trendy metallic sunglasses on her stroll
One-year-old Evander, appeared content as he sat in the stroller, being pushed by Erin.
The little man was dressed in a pair of orange shorts, a grey T-shirt and he wore a peaked baseball cap to protect his face from the sun.
The couple have enjoyed lots of quality time in the Eastern Suburbs in recent months and last week the family enjoyed a trip to Bondi Beach with their bub.
Thirsy! The model was seen carrying a takeaway drink in one hand as she pushed the stroller in the other
All black everything: While Erin showed off a lighter look while her husband Example wore a dark look
The pair split their time between England and Australia but have been making the most of the Australian summer in recent weeks.
Erin and Example became engaged in late 2012 and went on to wed in May 2013
Evander, who was born last December, is the model's only child with her DJ husband.
The pair have spoken in the past of their desire to expand their family, with Erin revealing shortly after her first son's birth that she 'couldn't wait' to have more children.
Erin and Example met in 2011 after she interviewed the British star during music festival season for her former gig at MTV.
Little man! The one-year-old appeared content as the family made their way along the scenic coastal path
